note.p: Servant and putative clairvoyant. Daughter of James Arrowsmith and Elizabeth Haliday (or Halliday), who married in South Shields in 1824. Niece of Ann Arrowsmith and Mary Haliday, Harriet Martineau’s landlady, in Tynemouth, Northumberland, 1841; thought by Martineau to be a clairvoyant, 1844. Martineau’s cook, 1851. Emigrated to Australia, 1857. Married Etienne Pierre Morel in Victoria, Australia, in 1865.
Admission Registers of Adelaide Hospital 1841-1946 (State Records of South Australia GRG78/49)
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/826/7/11/15), 1851 (HO107/2441/52/4)
England & Wales, christening index, 1530–1980 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 June 2022)
